phrs.translation: 引线, 保险丝, 关于这家名为斧子科技
近接信管, 近炸引信, 近发引信, 邻近信管
引信鉴别, 引信光束入射

sentences.sentence: Another project recently released by Dassault / SolidWorks is n!Fuze.
sentences.translation: 另一款产品是达索的SolidWorks最近发布的n!

sentences.sentence: Box.net has partnered with Fuze meeting to add real-time online meetings and screen sharing.
sentences.translation: net已经与Fuze Meeting达成合作关系，为其网站添加实时在线会议和屏幕分享功能。

sentences.sentence: Fuze automatically includes all related files to help prevent broken assemblies or missing parts.
sentences.translation: Fuze将自动带上所有文件关联以防装配破坏或零件遗失。
